definition: with the hand swung below shoulder level, marked by deception
details:
adverb
- with the hand swung below shoulder level
= synonyms: underarm
- slyly and secretly
= example: slyly and secretly
= synonyms: underhandedly
adjective
- marked by deception
= example: marked by deception
= synonyms: sneaky
- with hand brought forward and up from below shoulder level
= example: with hand brought forward and up from below shoulder level
= synonyms: underarm
